question: Which among the following statements is the correct definition of the term Carrying capacity of the land?
option1: It is the gross total of the natural vegetation in the land
option2: It is the number of animals a given area of land can support with its natural vegetation minus the respiration rate
option3: It is the number of animals a given area of land can support with its natural vegetation and artificial vegetation
option4: It is the number of animals a given area of land can support with its natural vegetation
answer: It is the number of animals a given area of land can support with its natural vegetation
explanation:
The number of animals has to be decided keeping in view the carrying capacity of the land.
The carrying capacity - It refers to the number of animals a given area of land can support with its natural vegetation.
